Literature.Title: Effects of net charge and the number of positively charged residues on the biological activity of amphipathic alpha-helical cationic antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Hale JD, Vasil AI, Jiang Z, Hancock RE, Vasil ML, Hodges RS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAK(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CP204(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa WR5(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M2(MIC=>500.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=2µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium C587(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus C622(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis C621(MIC=64µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=32µg/ml)
